titleStmt.title: Greenes Tu quoque, or, The cittie gallant As it hath beene diuers times acted by the Queenes Maiesties seruants, written by Io. Cooke Gent.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Jo., fl. 1614.
Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
Greene, Thomas, d. 1612.

notesStmt.note: Editor's note "to the reader" signed: Thomas Heywood.
Printer's name from STC. "Quires G-K may be by a different printer or compositor".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
